ygData.subject: Re: My thoughts on pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: Um, I ran into a clockwork merchant in the Magician Guild who would not sell to me because of my reputation... later I was able to buy from this merchant... so
ygData.messageBody:
Um, I ran into a clockwork merchant in the Magician Guild who would not sell
to me because of my reputation...
later I was able to buy from this merchant...
so faction does seem to effect clockwerk merchants as well

Emong
17th circle Enchanter
Mith Marr

Also let's find a way to raise our faction with the merchants too so we pay
> a lot less for those expensive components =) Also note that Merchant
Faction
> only affects the, umm.. "real" gnome merchants, not the clockwork
> merchants... I think
>
> Catbik Tinkerton
> Champions of Brell
> Lvl 30 Warlock
> Bertoxx =)
